Post.title: Kafka metrics
Post._content:
## 
> KafkaKafka metricsKafka.

## Kafka metrics
KafkaYammer MetricsMetric
Yammer Metrics6Metrics  GaugesCountersHistogramsTimersHealth ChecksMetrics Annotation
Yammer MetricsMetricsReporterConsole ReporterJMX ReporterCSV ReporterSLF4J ReporterHTTP ReporterGanglia ReporterGraphite Reporter
KafkaMetrics

### metrics
#### 

```
final MetricRegistry metrics = new MetricRegistry();
```

#### Gauges
gauge

```
public class QueueManager {
    private final Queue queue;
    public QueueManager(MetricRegistry metrics, String name) {
        this.queue = new Queue();
        // name(QueueManager.class, name, "size") .
        metrics.register(MetricRegistry.name(QueueManager.class, name, "size"),
                         new Gauge<Integer>() {
                             @Override
                             public Integer getValue() {
                                 return queue.size();
                             }
                         });
    }
}
```

#### Counters
counterAtomicLonggaugejob

```
private final Counter pendingJobs = metrics.counter(name(QueueManager.class, "pending-jobs"));
public void addJob(Job job) {
    // 
    pendingJobs.inc();
    queue.offer(job);
}
public Job takeJob() {
    pendingJobs.dec();
    return queue.take();
}

MetricRegistry.name(QueueManager.class, "jobs", "size")
```

#### Histograms
histogrammin,max,mean,stddev,median,P75,P90,P95,P98,P99,P99.9

```
private final Histogram responseSizes = metrics.histogram(name(RequestHandler.class, "response-sizes"));

public void handleRequest(Request request, Response response) {
    // 
    responseSizes.update(response.getContent().length);
}
```

#### Timers
Timerresponse

```
private final Timer responses = metrics.timer(name(RequestHandler.class, "responses"));

public String handleRequest(Request request, Response response) {
    final Timer.Context context = responses.time();
    try {
        // 
        return "OK";
    } finally {
        context.stop();
    }
}
```

#### Health Checks


```
final HealthCheckRegistry healthChecks = new HealthCheckRegistry();

public class DatabaseHealthCheck extends HealthCheck {
    private final Database database;

    public DatabaseHealthCheck(Database database) {
        this.database = database;
    }

    @Override
    public HealthCheck.Result check() throws Exception {
        if (database.isConnected()) {
            return HealthCheck.Result.healthy();
        } else {
            return HealthCheck.Result.unhealthy("Cannot connect to " + database.getUrl());
        }
    }
}

healthChecks.register("postgres", new DatabaseHealthCheck(database));
```

#### Metrics Annotation


```
/**
* 
*/
@Timed
public void call() {
}
    
/**
* 
*/
@Counted
public void userLogin(){
}

//other
@CachedGauge @Gauge @ExceptionMetered @Metered @Metric
``` 

### metrics
#### ConsoleReporter


```
final ConsoleReporter reporter = ConsoleReporter.forRegistry(metrics)
				                    .convertRatesTo(TimeUnit.SECONDS)
				                    .convertDurationsTo(TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS).build();
metrics.register("jvm.mem", new MemoryUsageGaugeSet());
metrics.register("jvm.gc", new GarbageCollectorMetricSet());
                                                
reporter.start(5, TimeUnit.MINUTES);
```

#### JmxReporter
JmxMBeanJMXRPC API

```
final JmxReporter reporter = JmxReporter.forRegistry(registry).build();
reporter.start();
```

#### CsvReporter
metric.csv

```
final CsvReporter reporter = CsvReporter.forRegistry(registry)
                                        .formatFor(Locale.US)
                                        .convertRatesTo(TimeUnit.SECONDS)
                                        .convertDurationsTo(TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS)
                                        .build(new File("~/projects/data/"));
reporter.start(1, TimeUnit.SECONDS);
```

#### Slf4jReporter
slf4j

```
final Slf4jReporter reporter = Slf4jReporter.forRegistry(registry)
                                            .outputTo(LoggerFactory.getLogger("com.example.metrics"))
                                            .convertRatesTo(TimeUnit.SECONDS)
                                            .convertDurationsTo(TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS)
                                            .build();
reporter.start(1, TimeUnit.MINUTES);
```

#### HTTP Reporter
webListenermetricsHealthCheckServletThreadDumpServletMetricsServletPingServletJson

```
public class MyMetricsServletListener extends MetricsServlet.ContextListener {
	
	public static final MetricRegistry metrics = new MetricRegistry();

	@Override
	protected MetricRegistry getMetricRegistry() {
		
		metrics.register("jvm.mem", new MemoryUsageGaugeSet());
		metrics.register("jvm.gc", new GarbageCollectorMetricSet());
		System.out.println(">>.Listener success...");
		return metrics;
	}
}
```

```
public class MyHealthCheckServletListener extends HealthCheckServlet.ContextListener {

	public static final HealthCheckRegistry healthCheck = new HealthCheckRegistry();
	@Override
	protected HealthCheckRegistry getHealthCheckRegistry() {
		
		healthCheck.register("postgres", new TFHealthCheck(false));
		return healthCheck;
	}
}
```

```
	<listener>
        <listener-class>com.immomo.hubble.kafka.servlet.MyMetricsServletListener</listener-class>
	</listener>
	<listener>
        <listener-class>com.immomo.hubble.kafka.servlet.MyHealthCheckServletListener</listener-class>
	</listener>
	
	<servlet>
        <servlet-name>metrics</servlet-name>
        <servlet-class>com.codahale.metrics.servlets.AdminServlet</servlet-class>
	</servlet>
	<servlet-mapping>
	   <servlet-name>metrics</servlet-name>
	   <url-pattern>/metrics/*</url-pattern>
	</servlet-mapping>
```

[](https://github.com/dropwizard/metrics)


### Kafka
#### kafka.server
BrokerTopicMetrics,name=MessagesInPerSec: 
BrokerTopicMetrics,name=BytesInPerSec: 
BrokerTopicMetrics,name=BytesOutPerSec: 
ReplicaManager,name=UnderReplicatedPartitions: 0|ISR|<|all replicas|
ReplicaManager,name=PartitionCount: 
ReplicaManager,name=LeaderCount: Leader
ReplicaManager,name=IsrShrinksPerSec: ISR
ReplicaManager,name=IsrExpandsPerSec: ISR value is 0
ReplicaFetcherManager,name=MaxLag,clientId=Replica: followerleader
FetcherLagMetrics,name=ConsumerLag,clientId=([-.\w]+),topic=([-.\w]+),partition=([0-9]+): follower
DelayedOperationPurgatory,name=PurgatorySize,delayedOperation=Produce: producer
DelayedOperationPurgatory,name=PurgatorySize,delayedOperation=Fetch: 
KafkaRequestHandlerPool,name=RequestHandlerAvgIdlePercent: 

#### kafka.network
kafka.network:type=RequestMetrics,name=$1,request={Produce|FetchConsumer|FetchFollower}
RequestsPerSec: 
TotalTimeMs: 
RequestQueueTimeMs: 
LocalTimeMs: leader
RemoteTimeMs: follower
ResponseQueueTimeMs: 
ResponseSendTimeMs: 
kafka.network:type=SocketServer,name=NetworkProcessorAvgIdlePercent: 
    
#### kafka.controller
KafkaController,name=ActiveControllerCount: broker
ControllerStats,name=LeaderElectionRateAndTimeMs: leader
ControllerStats,name=UncleanLeaderElectionsPerSec: Unclean leader

### Monitoring
#### 
1.WebJson
2.Httpredis
3.storm

```

<dependency>
    <groupId>io.dropwizard.metrics</groupId>
    <artifactId>metrics-servlets</artifactId>
    <version>3.1.0</version>
</dependency>
```

#### 
1.KafkaReporterScheduledReporterJsonmetrics
2.kafkaProducerTopickafka
3.stormkafka

Pom

```
<dependency>
    <groupId>org.apache.kafka</groupId>
    <artifactId>kafka_2.11</artifactId>
    <version>0.10.2.1</version>
    <exclusions>
        <exclusion>
            <groupId>org.apache.zookeeper</groupId>
            <artifactId>zookeeper</artifactId>
			</exclusion>
    </exclusions>
</dependency>
<dependency>
    <groupId>org.apache.zookeeper</groupId>
    <artifactId>zookeeper</artifactId>
    <version>3.4.10</version>
    <exclusions>
        <exclusion>
            <groupId>com.sun.jmx</groupId>
            <artifactId>jmxri</artifactId>
        </exclusion>
			<exclusion>
				<groupId>com.sun.jdmk</groupId>
				<artifactId>jmxtools</artifactId>
			</exclusion>
			<exclusion>
				<groupId>javax.jms</groupId>
				<artifactId>jms</artifactId>
			</exclusion>
		</exclusions>
	</dependency>
	<dependency>
	       <groupId>io.dropwizard.metrics</groupId>
	       <artifactId>metrics-core</artifactId>
	       <version>3.1.0</version>
	</dependency>
```

#### Gauges

```
public class QueueManager {
    private final Queue queue;
    public QueueManager(MetricRegistry metrics, String name) {
        this.queue = new Queue();
        // name(QueueManager.class, name, "size") .
        metrics.register(MetricRegistry.name(QueueManager.class, name, "size"),
                         new Gauge<Integer>() {

                                 return queue.size();

                         });

}
```

#### Counters

```
private final Counter pendingJobs = metrics.counter(name(QueueManager.class, "pending-jobs"));
public void addJob(Job job) {
    //

}
public Job takeJob() {

}

MetricRegistry.name(QueueManager.class, "jobs", "size")
```

```
private final Timer responses = metrics.timer(name(RequestHandler.class, "responses"));

public String handleRequest(Request request, Response response) {
```

#### Health Checks


```
final HealthCheckRegistry healthChecks = new HealthCheckRegistry();

public class DatabaseHealthCheck extends HealthCheck {
    private final Database database;

    public DatabaseHealthCheck(Database database) {
        this.database = database;
    }

    @Override
    public HealthCheck.Result check() throws Exception {
        if (database.isConnected()) {
            return HealthCheck.Result.healthy();
        } else {
            return HealthCheck.Result.unhealthy("Cannot connect to " + database.getUrl());
        }
    }
}

healthChecks.register("postgres", new DatabaseHealthCheck(database));
```

```
public class MyMetricsServletListener extends MetricsServlet.ContextListener {

public static final MetricRegistry metrics = new MetricRegistry();

@Override
protected MetricRegistry getMetricRegistry() {

    metrics.register("jvm.mem", new MemoryUsageGaugeSet());
    metrics.register("jvm.gc", new GarbageCollectorMetricSet());
    System.out.println(">>.Listener success...");
    return metrics;
}

}
```

```
public class MyHealthCheckServletListener extends HealthCheckServlet.ContextListener {

public static final HealthCheckRegistry healthCheck = new HealthCheckRegistry();
@Override
protected HealthCheckRegistry getHealthCheckRegistry() {

    healthCheck.register("postgres", new TFHealthCheck(false));
    return healthCheck;
}

}
```

Metrics Annotation

final ConsoleReporter reporter = ConsoleReporter.forRegistry(metrics)
.convertRatesTo(TimeUnit.SECONDS)
.convertDurationsTo(TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS).build();
metrics.register(jvm.mem, new MemoryUsageGaugeSet());
metrics.register(jvm.gc, new GarbageCollectorMetricSet());

reporter.start(5, TimeUnit.MINUTES);

final JmxReporter reporter = JmxReporter.forRegistry(registry).build();
reporter.start();

final CsvReporter reporter = CsvReporter.forRegistry(registry)
.formatFor(Locale.US)
.convertRatesTo(TimeUnit.SECONDS)
.convertDurationsTo(TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS)
.build(new File(~/projects/data/));
reporter.start(1, TimeUnit.SECONDS);

final Slf4jReporter reporter = Slf4jReporter.forRegistry(registry)
.outputTo(LoggerFactory.getLogger(com.example.metrics))
.convertRatesTo(TimeUnit.SECONDS)
.convertDurationsTo(TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS)
.build();
reporter.start(1, TimeUnit.MINUTES);

public class MyMetricsServletListener extends MetricsServlet.ContextListener {

public static final MetricRegistry metrics = new MetricRegistry();

@Override
protected MetricRegistry getMetricRegistry() {

    metrics.register("jvm.mem", new MemoryUsageGaugeSet());
    metrics.register("jvm.gc", new GarbageCollectorMetricSet());
    System.out.println(">>.Listener success...");
    return metrics;
}

}

public class MyHealthCheckServletListener extends HealthCheckServlet.ContextListener {

public static final HealthCheckRegistry healthCheck = new HealthCheckRegistry();
@Override
protected HealthCheckRegistry getHealthCheckRegistry() {

    healthCheck.register("postgres", new TFHealthCheck(false));
    return healthCheck;
}

}

<listener>
    <listener-class>com.immomo.hubble.kafka.servlet.MyMetricsServletListener</listener-class>
</listener>
<listener>
    <listener-class>com.immomo.hubble.kafka.servlet.MyHealthCheckServletListener</listener-class>
</listener>

<servlet>
    <servlet-name>metrics</servlet-name>
    <servlet-class>com.codahale.metrics.servlets.AdminServlet</servlet-class>
</servlet>
<servlet-mapping>
   <servlet-name>metrics</servlet-name>
   <url-pattern>/metrics/*</url-pattern>
</servlet-mapping>
